description: Manage your digital advertising spend with Looker
name: Digital Marketing

items.title: Optimizations
items.description: Take immediate action to optimize your marketing spend and improve results. These opportunity reports show you what to stop doing and what to do more of.

pages.title: Optimizations

sections.title: Opportunities
sections.description: Increase your bids to take advantage for these well performing Ads, Keywords, and Ad Groups. They are ranking below the first position and have room to drive more conversions to you at a good price.

items.description: Increase the bid on these Ads to drive more conversions.

sections.title: Big Movers
sections.description: See Ad Groups, Keywords, and Ads that have had big performance changes recently. Use these to spot positive and negative trends and act on them.

sections.title: Underperforming
sections.description: Quickly find Ad Groups, Keywords, and Ads that are underperforming compared to their peers. Fix or pause underperformers to gain immediate improvements in your marketing spend.

items.description: Quickly find the ads that need to be paused or have their bid lowered.

sections.title: Alerts
sections.description: We show you Ads and Keywords that are performing out of the bounds for your account. Pause or fix these immediately to improve performance.

items.description: Pause or lower the bid of these ads. They are performing much lower than your other ads.

items.description: Pause or lower the bid of these keywords. They are performing much lower than your other keywords.
